item.title: How to format note lines using GP Web Services
item.description: A client found that standard newline escape sequences weren’t working as expected within customer notes when importing data into GP 10 using Web Services. This issue highlights a difference in how Web Services manages formatting compared to eConnect, specifically when it comes to newline characters in Notes. Using GP 10 Web Services, typical newline representations like \r\n, \r, and \n (or their Visual Basic equivalents vbCr, vbLf, or vbCrLf) all have the same result in notes.
